title: WCAS SPANISH 125-0-25 Accelerated Intermediate Spanish
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

One Addtl hour or more TBA

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Communicative method. Further development of vocabulary, grammar, speaking and writing skills through readings and short films. Outside on-line video. Three class meetings per week. Offered in fall only.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: AP score of 3 or online Spanish Language Placement Exam. Attendance at first class is required.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: For more information on the course contact the coordinator Maria Teresa Villanueva m-villanueva@northwestern.edu

subject: SPANISH
